class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.i18n.HibernateI18NProcedureMetadata
class.comment: Table to i18n metadata for the procedure. Mapping file: mapping/i18n/HibernateI18NProcedureMetadata.hbm.xml

column.name: objectId
column.comment: Foreign Key (FK) to the related procedure. Contains "procedure".procedureid

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the procedure

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the procedure

column.name: shortname
column.comment: Locale/language specific shortname of the procedure

column.name: longname
column.comment: Locale/language specific longname of the procedure
